mapper.select: /*通过BS查询Method*/ SELECT T2.ROW_ID AS ID, T1.NAME AS BUSINESSSERVICE, /*BS*/ T2.NAME AS METHODNAME, /*方法名*/ EMPLOYEE_X.FST_NAME AS LastBy, /*方法修改人*/ EMPLOYEE_XX.LOGIN AS LastByCode, /*方法修改人Id*/ T2.PROG_LANG AS ProgLang, /*程序语言*/ T2.SCRIPT, /*方法代码*/ T2.LAST_UPD /*方法修改时间*/ FROM SIEBEL.S_SERVICE T1, SIEBEL.S_SERVICE_SCRPT T2, SIEBEL.S_CONTACT EMPLOYEE_X, SIEBEL.S_USER EMPLOYEE_XX WHERE T1.ROW_ID = T2.SERVICE_ID(+) AND T2.LAST_UPD_BY = EMPLOYEE_X.ROW_ID(+) AND EMPLOYEE_X.ROW_ID = EMPLOYEE_XX.ROW_ID(+) AND T1.NAME = #{methodName}
